text: Pipturus is a flowering plant genus in the nettle family, Urticaceae. ==Selected species== * Pipturus albidus (Hook. & Arn.) A.Gray ex H.Mann - Māmaki (Hawaii) * Pipturus arborescens (Link) C.B.Rob., 1911 * Pipturus argenteus (G.Forst.) Wedd., 1869 - Queensland grass-cloth plant, native mulberry * Pipturus forbesii Krajina * Pipturus platyphyllus Wedd. * Pipturus schaeferi J.Florence (French Polynesia) Pipturus argenteus flowers and fruit ==References== ==External links== Category:Urticaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Pipturus
